-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://dairndadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/dairndfilesys/userdata1.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

CREATE TABLE emp_data_march (
    Series_reference VARCHAR(20),
    Period VARCHAR(10),
    Data_value DECIMAL(18, 2),
    Suppressed VARCHAR(3),
    STATUS VARCHAR(10),
    UNITS VARCHAR(10),
    Magnitude INT,
    Subject VARCHAR(50),
    Groupname CHAR(1),
    Series_title_1 VARCHAR(50),
    Series_title_2 VARCHAR(50),
    Series_title_3 VARCHAR(50),
    Series_title_4 VARCHAR(50),
    Series_title_5 VARCHAR(50)
);

source:
%%sql

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS staging.userdata
USING PARQUET
LOCATION '/userdata1.parquet';

%%sql

CREATE TABLE delta.usertable
(
registration_dttm timestamp ,
id integer ,
first_name string ,
last_name string ,
email string ,
gender string ,
ip_address string ,
cc string ,
country string ,
birthdate string ,
salary double ,
title string ,
comments string 
)
using DELTA;

%%sql

insert overwrite table
delta.usertable
select * from staging.userdata;

%%sql

CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS config;

%%sql

CREATE TABLE config.dbingestion_config_details (
  database_name string,
  schema_name string,
  table_name string,
  configurations string,
  created_at string,
  status string,
  created_user string,
  connection_id int
)
using DELTA

%%sql

CREATE TABLE config.incremental_details (
  database_name string,
  schema_name string,
  table_name string,
  value string,
  column_name string,
  operator string,
  created_at string,
  created_user string,
  status string
)
USING DELTA

# import azure.functions as func
import logging
from azure.identity import ManagedIdentityCredential
from azure.mgmt.storage import StorageManagementClient
from azure.keyvault.secrets import SecretClient
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

value ={
      "id": "https://akv-rt-develop-rt-comm.vault.azure.net/secrets/45-day-exp-test",
      "attributes": {
        "enabled": "true",
        "nbf": 1721639412,
        "exp": 1725959356,
        "created": 1721639611,
        "updated": 1724032012,
        "recoveryLevel": "Recoverable",
        "recoverableDays": 90
      },
      "tags": {
        "description": "This Secret was generated to test the Secret Expiry Key Vault notification (45 days) ",
        "subscription_id" : "85daead2-a68a-4f66-9432-4b2decfc8822",
        "resource_group" : "omkar-rg",
        "resource_type" : "storage account",
        "resource_name": "pocpoc1",
        "key_vault_url":"https://kv-rotatation.vault.azure.net/",
        "days_after_expiry":90,
        "secret_name" : "stgact"
      }

subs_id = value['tags']['subscription_id']
rg_name = value['tags']['resource_group']
resource_name = value['tags']['resource_name']
kv_url = value['tags']["key_vault_url"]
days_after_expiry = value['tags']["days_after_expiry"]
secret_name = value['tags']["secret_name"]
resource_type = value["tags"]["resource_type"]

if (resource_type == "storage_account"):
        storage_client = StorageManagementClient(credential, subs_id)
        print('Getting the existing key')
        keys_before = storage_client.storage_accounts.list_keys(rg_name, resource_name)  # arg1 is resource groupName, arg2 is StorageAcct Name
        print('before - ' + keys_before.keys[0].value)
